metadata.name: SEVEN_CRD_01
metadata.description:
"SEVEN_CRD_01" (2022) is the first illustration in a series of sci-fi portraits inspired by 90's anime, in collaboration with Seven Industries Concept and Research Department.


Title: SEVEN_CRD_01
Illustration: Davey Perkins
Format - 3500  ×  4500 px, .jpeg
Year - 2022
